items.title: UnitedHealth Group (UNH): Among Billionaire Chase Coleman’s Stocks with Huge Upside Potential
items.description: We recently published a list of Billionaire Chase Coleman’s 10 Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. In this article, we are going to take a look at where UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (NYSE:UNH) stands against other Billionaire Chase Coleman’s stocks with huge upside potential. Equity markets achieved an unprecedented winning streak over the past two years at […]

items.title: UnitedHealth’s Stock Is Ailing. A Bigger Business Hasn’t Helped.
items.description: UnitedHealth has shed almost $200 billion in market value over the last five months. More customers and more business lines were supposed to help the stock.
